title: Collaboration Management for Federated Learning
summaries: in the conventional FL framework, propose a platform (FLCSP) to lower barriers of using FL, and these barriers are (1) use-case-specific preparation and setup, (2) time-consuming collaboration establishment and collaborators matching, (3) debugging the process and keeping track of the artifacts is challenging
FLCSP: federated learning collaboration and sharing platform
systemModel: __frontend layer__: provides interfaces for uses and external developers
__services API layer__: provides an internal low-level API of the services used by the frontend layer
__services layer__: provides modular services furthersubdivided into functional componens and storage components
